Summary: A stereotypical Disc UFO with Green Red possibly green lights Hovering over a part of Midland
divs: Sighting DetailsDisc UFO with rotating multicolored lights over a local elementary school (estimated location) The view was brief, possibly 5 minutes. This occurance was combined with a curious meteorological event at a separate part of town (to the east) where there was an amorphous red luminous event, with the appearance of dripping glowing blood. All of this needs to be confirmed with a friend, but the event is inextricable from my memory.
trends: There have been 10 other sightings in Midland
There were no other sightings in Midland on or around March 1st 1997
